posts.post_title: Wtb off back hal chase all poses.
posts.post_content: Looking for rare or off back t206 Hal Chase to complete my back run!

If this fits the bill, please feel free to PM me:

[IMG]https://photos.imageevent.com/exhibitman/saleholding/websize/1910%20T206%20Chase%20blue%20Old%20Mill.jpg[/IMG]
Hey Powerman good deal on the Pink Chase.  Good luck with the back run!!
